website_summaries.verdict: This intuitive raclette features simplified temp controls -- perfect for beginners.
pros: Includes 8 large non-stick raclette pans and an immersible grill plate that is simple to clean
Designed to grill fish, chicken, sausage, vegetables on top while heating cheese and even desserts below
Grill surface has raised edges to prevent spilling
cons: Some users reported the non-stick coating flaking off after light use

customer_reviews.title: A fun dinner party!
customer_reviews.text: This made for a fun dinner party. Prepare some cheeses and other yummies, and then just sit down and enjoy! Lots of combinations suggested online. People had loads of fun chatting while each made their own combination of foods. Tip: cook the potatoes ahead of time (to put the cheeses on) but they tend to cool quickly. Also, don't bother with skewers on top grill - not all food will hit the cooking surface equally. We also made 's'mores' with graham crackers and marshmallows and chocolate melted below.
customer_reviews.author: AvidReader

customer_reviews.title: Absolute junk. This thing doesn’t get remotely hot enough ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolute junk. This thing doesn’t get remotely hot enough. Takes FOREVER to grill anything. Your dinner will last for hours.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Bad product. Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money. The plastic handles of the little pans are melting on the edge of the upper part, which gets very hot but it doesn't get hot enough to cook or fry the food in those pans. I used a raclette many times before but this never happened. Going to return it with the burned/ melted plastic parts
customer_reviews.author: Ozi

customer_reviews.title: Careful washing these!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this 8 person for Christmas dinner. While it did its job quite well I would recommend two smaller ones for larger parties. I would have given this one higher starts but the pans are exceptionally sharp on the under side (poor machining i suppose) and I sliced my finger washing one. We have had raclettes in the past and never run across this problem before.
customer_reviews.author: P. Santos

customer_reviews.title: I was really expecting to get my Reclette and when we got it we loved it and the non stick was working perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Hello! I was really expecting to get my Reclette and when we got it we loved it and the non stick was working perfectly. After 2 times of using it the non stick is not working, food sticks in the plate and it almost imposible to clean. Which is frustating because we have taken care of it so much when washing it. I am really dissapointed,is there a way I can get a new plate for my reclette? I can send pictures if necessary. 2 uses = 0 non stick
customer_reviews.author: Daniela

customer_reviews.title: It was okay for the price
customer_reviews.text: It was okay for the money. I bought it because of a review. A10 inch skillet does it on it. It takes a long time to melt the cheese. If you are just throwing a pop up party it's great. You plan to use it often invest in a nice one.
customer_reviews.author: C-Note

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful investment
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got the other more expensive model. I bought this because it was much cheaper but still ranked #2. It was the best purchase and I love it. It’s longer and grills beautifully. If you’re looking to buy a Raclette this is the one to buy. The only minor complaint is that the mini spatulas are wooden but still worked fine so still gets 5stars. The funnest meal for your family or couples. We had 2 grills for 8 people and it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Kennell

customer_reviews.title: I'd only recommend it for small food types and don't expect much ...
customer_reviews.text: The pre heat got hot enough to smoke the oil during first prep. Then stopped. It refused to burn up the vinegar oil that was patted onto the bottom plates and the top grill/pan. Tried to cook kabobs. Took way longer than a standard indoor grill (by about 40 minutes longer). Haven't used it since. Don't know if broken or by design too lazy to send it back. I'd only recommend it for small food types and don't expect much from bottom plates. Definitely inferior cooking large meat like steak or even kabobs.
customer_reviews.author: kyle ludford

customer_reviews.title: Seems great, still new
customer_reviews.text: Our old machine, a T-Fal, conked out after many years of service. They don't seem to sell them in the USA anymore, so I went with this one, which is almost identical in design. Working great so far. Those little plastic scrapers that come with it seem absurd & unnecessary, and possibly the sharp edge would scratch the nonstick finish on the tray. Use a piece of bread instead
customer_reviews.author: Uptown Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a must have!!!
customer_reviews.text: The best idea for a get together or just you and your husband fun night. Love that the grill heats up super fast and the little plates great concept it’s an all around great Raclette. Food comes out so tasty and amazing and cooked well. Glad we brought it.
customer_reviews.author: Zendora

customer_reviews.title: I DO NOT KNOW HOW CAN BE EXCHANGE FOR A BETTER QUALITY! PLEASE LET ME KNOW IF SOMTHING CAN ...
customer_reviews.text: THESE PRODUCT FEELS AND LOOKS CHEAP!! CHEAP!!! I DO NOT KNOW HOW CAN BE EXCHANGE FOR A BETTER QUALITY ! PLEASE LET ME KNOW IF SOMTHING CAN BE DONE. JUANA.
customer_reviews.author: juana r.

customer_reviews.title: Comes used with food still baked on it
customer_reviews.text: I saw no indication this was a used product. I thought I was buying new. It came badly stuffed back in its damaged box. Its bubble wrap wadded up inside and not around the product. There was food burned on the grill still and food stains still in the warming area. What a horrible thing to do to someone.
customer_reviews.author: D. Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Quick heat-up and good temperature control
customer_reviews.text: Extremely versatile cooking method. Allows kids to customize their own meal - bit hit. Quick heat-up and good temperature control. Does NOT fill the home with smoke when using it as a grill. Nonstick surfaces are easy to clean. I purchased a set of silicone tongs and spatulas to use with this, just as a precaution.
customer_reviews.author: Chris M.

customer_reviews.title: Not hot at all!
customer_reviews.text: Omg how does anyone cook anything on this?? The temperature is so bad, it doesn’t even get close to being hot!!!! I know fondue and this kind of stuff is meant to take long, but this is a whole different level! Idk how it has so many good reviews!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome table top grill
customer_reviews.text: We love this thing. Used it for breakfast (pancakes and bacon) and dinner (short rib and veggies). Kids love it and feel as if they are cooking. We’ve done crab cakes on it too!
customer_reviews.author: Dawg owner

customer_reviews.title: A great way to bring people together
customer_reviews.text: Bring up to six people to the dinner table. Now, provide them with some easily prepared food items including some melty cheese and let everyone create dinner to their individual tastes. It's fun, it's practical and impossible for anyone to be anti-social
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Wencel

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not the best but not the worst either. A bit on the flimsy side but for the price, what can you expect. No real temperature control, it's basically low or high, but once it's on it works fine. I do like it.
customer_reviews.author: Dakini777

customer_reviews.title: Easily damaged
customer_reviews.text: I used it 2 times and the grill is already damaged. That material is very dangerous for your health when it’s damaged so I can’t use it anymore
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!!
customer_reviews.text: This product doesn’t have a temp control and then setting it has doesn’t heat enough to cook fast enough. I had to actually get a pan and cook meat and poultry because of the low temp. Really bad product, don’t recommend at all.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Micolta

customer_reviews.title: Check all parts before turning on!
customer_reviews.text: Okay for the first few times this worked great however you have to be careful to check all the parts before plugging it in. After pulling it out of the box from storage, one of the scrapers got caught between the top plate and the coils. Needless to say our house smells like burnt plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Shalane M

customer_reviews.title: ... Italy it works perfectly and is a lot o fun to cook the raclette cheese on it
customer_reviews.text: I have this item in Italy it works perfectly and is a lot o fun to cook the raclette cheese on it , there is only an other problem the cost of the Raclette cheese 73,-- $ for 3.1/2 pounds ! will find a substitute cheese. 1
customer_reviews.author: dante david

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: Absolute junk. No temperature control. Teflon coating came off after the second use. Cheap materials. Spend a few dollars more and save yourself some hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Dietmar Ebner

customer_reviews.title: Great gift.
customer_reviews.text: Love the grill on top a d the nonstick surfaces. Great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Zach

customer_reviews.title: Supper small and was not as described on pictures.
customer_reviews.text: I will not recommend to buy for $85. supper small and was not as described on pictures. Very small product. 8 person raclette is supper small. Be aware of this scam!!
customer_reviews.author: rekha

customer_reviews.title: Can’t wait for next winter
customer_reviews.text: Could not find a T-fal so I bought that one. Happy with it, works exactly as expected
customer_reviews.author: clemano

customer_reviews.title: No warm enough!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like this raclette set. Never really warmed enough to grill meat...
customer_reviews.author: Ma.

customer_reviews.title: great for a fast interactive dinner w the family!
customer_reviews.text: have been using about 1-2 times a month for the last few months and have not had any issues! works great, gets hot fast, easy to clean! my kids love using it feeling like they are the cooks!
customer_reviews.author: ajgb22

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Works very well. Easy to clean. I really recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Bruna Donato

customer_reviews.title: Great find
customer_reviews.text: We have a similar Raclette at home in Germany. It is a simple assembley, but sturdy. I love the way it works and for the money a great find. There is no need to spend $100 on a Raclette, this one will work just fine too.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the money
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. Has an on/off switch. It was missing the spatulas though. Otherwise I was very satisfied. It gets very hot and has a high spot for the grill pans to rest under.
customer_reviews.author: sharon hickey

customer_reviews.title: works great a little slow im used to using this product ...
customer_reviews.text: works great a little slow im used to using this product on a 220 german system but over all very very good
customer_reviews.author: byond10

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small gathering cookouts
customer_reviews.text: Great size for a small gathering. Top grill works great for meat, vegetables and even bread. Trays are perfect size - love to use it!
customer_reviews.author: Annika Diett

customer_reviews.title: Small & Functional
customer_reviews.text: Small raclette that works perfectly for 2 people although there is equipment for more.
customer_reviews.author: So*

customer_reviews.title: This grill works great. It allows us to eat well on our ...
customer_reviews.text: This grill works great. It allows us to eat well on our ketogenic diet.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.text: Not the best durable quality, but a great deal for the price. Perfect for an enjoyable evening with friends.
customer_reviews.author: Likeable

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these for Christmas eve with the family - none of whom had ever heard of raclette. There were 10 of us and this was perfect. It isn't one you would want to use all the time, but for special occasions (and if you don't want to spend much), definitely the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: Raclette pans melt !
customer_reviews.text: Quite disappointed with this product: if you put your raclette pans on top of the grill (where it's actually where you are supposed to put them when you don't use them...) they melt!! It looks like this product has never been tested !
customer_reviews.author: Olivier

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does not heat up food very well on top pan. Small pans underneath heat up well.
customer_reviews.author: makenzie

customer_reviews.title: Love it! I got 2 just in case it ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I got 2 just in case it could not accommodate my guest. Although I ended up with less people than expected I am glad I had an extra so that we would not be cramped over one raclette. Extremely easy to clean. I would definitely recommend this because it served its purpose for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Candi

customer_reviews.title: Fun Night
customer_reviews.text: This was well worth the price. great for a fun friday night with friends. We made chicken and peppers. Very easy to use and cooks really well.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: It is  easy  and  fun  to  use
customer_reviews.text: This one I bought as a gift so I haven't used it, but I have an older version of it and really like it. It
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun family dinners
customer_reviews.text: Our family loves raclette and table top grill dinners. It is a great family bonding meal, and I love how it teaches my teens how to cook food the way they like. We often the grill top to cook meats and the bottom trays for cheese. This is great fun and my family looks forward to dinner when I drag this out. I only gave this three stars because it is not very easy to clean. There is lots of little bits to keep up with, and the nonstick surface wears out over time. This would be a great intro unit, but I wouldn't recommend it if you were looking to invest in a nice set.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: Worked out great for Christmas! Cheese melted quick and the top part was easy to clean up. Very happy!!
customer_reviews.author: D.J.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Make sure the top part is in properly otherwise one side might pop out and scare the heck out of you
customer_reviews.author: Greenleaf

customer_reviews.title: very good if you enjoy to talk
customer_reviews.text: We used it the other day and it was a hit. The only problem was the grill on top because it takes too long to heat and cook. We eventually had to use the grill for the charcuterie and chicken. For the vegetables it was good, provided you have a small lid to cook with...it will all come dente style. Easy to clean, easy to store but with a problematic grill...then again if you enjoy good conversation with your guest and good wine...time to cook will not be a problem. (as a resource, you can cut your meat "pho" style)
customer_reviews.author: mommax2

customer_reviews.title: Great product - very easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Great product - very easy to clean. Heats up fast. I've grill seafood/thinly sliced meats on the top just fine.
customer_reviews.author: AY

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product is fantastic. Non-stick, easy to clean and efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Heba

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just like the one we used to have in France. Makes for a nice and quick dinner.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Clare

customer_reviews.title: My family uses this all the time and love it. Can't believe it was so cheap
customer_reviews.text: My family uses this all the time and love it. Can't believe it was so cheap, but works so well.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect for a small group. Easy to clean up. Did the job on a cold winter night!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! Used it multiple times for Raclette and picadas!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Lynch

customer_reviews.title: I love this Raclette Party Grill
customer_reviews.text: I love this Raclette Party Grill!! The only two things I don't like is that it is not dishwasher safe and if you use a marinade on meat the marinade residue burns on the grill top.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: good quality product, delivered on time, good service.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, great seller. All delivered on time! thank you
customer_reviews.author: DUCROCQ

customer_reviews.title: C'est fantastique
customer_reviews.text: Great for all French students. I enjoy having gotten it for this price, generally it is very pricey. I didn't like that it looks like I stole it from a library, but it has helped me understand French conjugation, more than I thought possible.
customer_reviews.author: J1sy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great size and no problem using in Japan. Good price and i like this one.
customer_reviews.author: Ryo s

customer_reviews.title: Perfect !
customer_reviews.text: perfect for 6. Quick and easy assembly. Raclette's pan are easy to clean ( handwash or dishwasher). Remember me my French village.
customer_reviews.author: Client Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for raclette lovers !
customer_reviews.text: Works great, gets hot in a very short time. Fits perfectly for our needs ( 4 pers.).
customer_reviews.author: ALAIN

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: We always had one of those when I grew up. It's perfect for when you have friends over. I probably get a second one for when we have more people over.
customer_reviews.author: F. W.

customer_reviews.title: Great raclette grill
customer_reviews.text: this grill is great for the price. It cooks evenly and makes great raclette. We use it very often, provides a great meal alternative and the kids love the fact that they cook their own food. It is rather small, so if you have more than 5 people in your party, get a bigger one. Frankly for the price, I am thinking about getting a second one to accommodate larger parties instead of a bigger one.
customer_reviews.author: Noverbo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for family. We don't use it very much but good for holiday season. Kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Rolling stones

customer_reviews.title: Good apparatus for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item about 1 1/2 month ago and used it already 4 times. It is not expensive, it works well. The difficulty is to find a good raclette cheese to use with. I brought some from France and now I will try to find some on Internet.
customer_reviews.author: yoyo

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product and makes for good conversation during dinner
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and makes for good conversation during dinner. Love it! Think every family should have one!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Arzuolaitis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for social time
customer_reviews.text: This raclette is ideal if you want to make of dinner a social time with family or friends. Grill chicken and veggies on the top and then put them in a tray with cheese over to melt! Our friends love it. The size is good for 6 (or more taking turns) but it's not too big if you just want to make it for two. Mine came without the spatulas but Amazon immediately sent me a new one and the return postage. No hassle.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: This grill is significantly less expensive than other options and is working great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Raclette is good
customer_reviews.text: The Toastess TPG-315 Raclette is a good value, well made and we anticipate getting years of use out of it. Since we once lived in Switzerland, raclette has become our traditional Christmas eve meal. This model will allow us to serve six people at once.
customer_reviews.author: K. Weber

customer_reviews.title: Xpensive
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this was everything that I wanted! It's not a crazy expensive raklette. It works just fine. Happy to own this!
customer_reviews.author: kristen ohearn

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It's non stick and very useful for my purpose. I use it to melt cheese that I top on my potatoes. This is a recipe that I mimic from my family in France.
customer_reviews.author: Jonnie M. Banks

customer_reviews.title: This is what I expected and the shipping was super fast so I'm just very glad of my purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is what I expected and the shipping was super fast so I'm just very glad of my purchase !
customer_reviews.author: Johan Martinod

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great way to eat - very fellowship oriented! "Party Grill" is a very appropriate name.
customer_reviews.author: John Ahrens

customer_reviews.title: For the price this is perfect! It is east to clean
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is perfect! It is east to clean. Meat and vegetables cook just fine. Our family really enjoy when we do raclette. The material is not the best but you wont be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Buy from someone else
customer_reviews.text: The grill is great and exactly what I wanted. But the company did not package the grill at all before mailing it. They just put the mailing address on the outside of the product box. The grill arrived with its box completely beat up. This was very frustrating because it was going to be a gift, and the box made it look like something I had dug out of my attic instead of buying new. I also had to open it to double check nothing was broken. I would recommend buying raclette grills, but not from this company.
customer_reviews.author: els

customer_reviews.title: Gave to my husband for as a christmas present
customer_reviews.text: We love this grill and have used it several times for "raclette" a french winter dish that I absolutely love (my husband is french). It was a great buy and it reminds my husband of "home". I highly recommend it. The size is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Yazming Garcia

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had any problems at all with this raclette grill. It's a great little grill, especially for the price. It's obviously not first-class, but is still sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: lp7777

customer_reviews.title: Amazing price/quality for this kind of product in NYC (much ...
customer_reviews.text: It worked perfectly! Amazing price/quality for this kind of product in NYC (much cheaper in France but it's difficult to find that price in NYC)
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Functions--but there is better
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and it is a great product for gatherings with family and friends. That being said, the teflon easily wears on the product, even after rigidly following the manufacturer's instructions. It heats up quite fast and the top grill does do a good job when cooking items. Be aware, once the teflon is gone, things will stick and it will not be pleasant to clean! This is a deal breaker for me. You can find better quality items out there.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah

customer_reviews.title: Pour le fun
customer_reviews.text: Appareil vraiment sympa et pas cher Probablement fragile car vraiment très léger mais après deux mois utilisé trois fois et toujours très pratique et facile à nettoyer
customer_reviews.author: Matthieu REYNÉ

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - would recommend
customer_reviews.text: We have friends who have Raclettes and have had Raclette Parties. We decided to dive in and get our own. We have had several meals on this and find the flat surface to be the best. It's a great tool to have family conversation and get the family involved with the cooking. We made pancakes and bacon on it for a family breakfast and had a great time. Lots of possibiiites with this. I picked this one because of the good reviews and am happy with the results.
customer_reviews.author: cd777

customer_reviews.title: For any French person
customer_reviews.text: Being a French person, I love this little machine! It is very easy to clean and very easy to use. I only took off a star because you cannot really control the temperature, and because of the shape of the paddles, they dont fit a rectangular piece of cheese perfectly, a little bit of the corners will be out of the paddle.
customer_reviews.author: Lili Jullien

customer_reviews.title: Not hot enough.
customer_reviews.text: It does not generate enough heat to give it that nice crusty brown surface on the cheese that a real raclette grill does. Other than that it’s a great Little grill I think. But I’m sending mine back for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: Par Hegardt

customer_reviews.title: Toastess is the Mostest
customer_reviews.text: The Toastess grill is fantastic for the money. Other brands were price as much as two and a half times for the same functionality (6 person grill). Toastess is non stick and cleans easily. 4 stars instead of 5 because there's no controlling the amount of heat once you plug it in. As a result, after about 30 minutes it gets pretty hot - particularly for melting the cheese in the trays.
customer_reviews.author: terry93004

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Used this for Christmas dinner with family . I ordered two so there could be one at Each end of the table. Was perfect! Worked well. Was a fun meal.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Otto

customer_reviews.title: Temperature Control
customer_reviews.text: Loved that this is a rectangular raclette instead of oval. Much more room to cook on. Great size for a group. I use 2 raclettes- I have an older oval one that doesn't have any temperature control which I use for meat so people who are vegetarian or pescetarian can cook on the other one. This one is so easy to clean and love the square trays.
customer_reviews.author: scubakiwi

customer_reviews.title: Good price for the product
customer_reviews.text: Good price for the product. My only suggestion is to have temperature control so you can control the heat and keep the cheese melted without burning it. The only way to prevent burning it is to turn it off. It only has an ON/OFF switch.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy Leaf

customer_reviews.title: Like all Raclette grills
customer_reviews.text: Like all Raclette grills, divide 6-person by 2 and you will get the number of people it is best suited for: three. This is not to fault the grill because it is a very good, high-quality design. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: R CHAP

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this raclette for a last minute friends gathering and it was perfect. Im glad i purchased it. It was perfect for grilling canadian ham, shrimp and asparagus. We also purchased different cheeses and they were all great
customer_reviews.author: Arianna

customer_reviews.title: Love my Racklette
customer_reviews.text: We love this racklette! We use it with family & friends. It's a lot of fun, brings everyone together, great conversation, food, wine & friends... Super fun!!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I love raclette and have purchased 2 of these as gifts. I have a pricier version, but as a starter raclette, this is a great option.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Bease

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing grill
customer_reviews.text: Slow to heat up and no temperature control. The trays started to melt when used. Spend more and maybe get a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Great little grill!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product and I love grilling all my food at once on it.
customer_reviews.author: Katchat3333

customer_reviews.title: ... here and rice in the steamer and voila no dirty dishes, comes off easy I wash right away ...
customer_reviews.text: I really use it a lot in the kitchen Ill make the meat and veggies here and rice in the steamer and voila no dirty dishes, comes off easy I wash right away when done, a bigger one would have been even better
customer_reviews.author: jose uren

customer_reviews.title: Family sized raclette
customer_reviews.text: Had racklette for the first time and had to Order one. Used it a few times since and so easy to clean it’s great. Good size.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Dawn Charlton-strang

customer_reviews.title: Love our raclette...
customer_reviews.text: I first had raclette in France, and ever since, I was hooked. We use this at least once a week. One side of the top grill seems to run a little hotter, but for the price, this is a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: jessi-wankenobi

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This machine works great. Has an on/off button. I am originally from France and I have used this machine here with my parents and it's pretty great. Love it and cannot wait for more cheesy nights. 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Delphine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice for family dinners. Easy to clean. Heats up fast. Nonstick. Good quality. Delivered in time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love having this in my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I use this all the time now. It's fantastic and so easy to clean. Heats up quickly and doesn't weigh a ton.

customer_reviews.title: A GREAT HIT !

customer_reviews.text: I have been using this Raclette set for 1 year and we never had any pb. it heats fast and well. Everybody aournd us loves it.

product_meta.title: Salton Raclette Indoor Electric Party Grill & Raclette, 8 Person, Black
product_meta.description: Size:8-personGather up your friends and family for a mouth-watering raclette get together! Grill fish, chicken, sausage and vegetables on the top grill, while the cheeses melt beneath in the 8 non-stick, color-coded pans. Equipped with 8 spatulas to remove the food, this easy-to-use and easy-to-clean raclette will bring people together over delicious food.Raised grill plate edges prevent spillsAdjustable temperature control and indicator lightImmersible grill plate for easy cleaningStay cool handlesAnti-slip feetIncludes 8 non-stick color-coded raclette pans and 8 spatulasCooking surface measures 18”x 9” (46cm x 22.5cm)1400W heating element
feature_bullets: 8 spatulas specially designed to remove food from raclette pans easily and without sticking
8 large pans for raclette cheese, desserts and more!
Non-stick surface for grilling meats, fish, and vegetables
Immersible grill plate for easy cleaning
Adjustable temperature control and indicator light
